Title: Vijay Tewari Briefs Us on Hyper-V in 2008 R2 SP1!
Description: Richard flies solo to talk to Vijay Tewari about the new features being added to Hyper-V in Windows Server 2008 R2 Service Pack 1. The beta of Service Pack 1 was announced at Tech Ed US for release in July 2010. Vijay talks about two key new features being added to Hyper-V: dynamic memory and remoteFX. The conversation also explores the future directions of virtualization. You can read Vijay's blog at http://blogs.technet.com/virtualization.
